titleStmt.title: (Copy of) report to the basilikosgrammateus concerning temple documents that have been sent

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: To Hermophilus, basilikos grammateus ofthe meris of Herakleides in the Arsinoite nome, from Peteuris ... presbyter of the priests of Boubastis of the village Bakchias. I have handed in to you a list of priests and a temple inventory ... for the current year which is the 28th of our lord Aurelius Commodus Antoninus Caesar Felix Augustus.; (2nd hand:) Through Hermophilus, on the fifth supplementary day of Mesore.
